mapper.select: SELECT qr_code, CONCAT(corr_edate,'_',corr_title) AS alarm_name, LEFT(NOW(),19) AS alarm_time FROM ( SELECT *, DATEDIFF(corr_edate,CURDATE()) AS diff_cnt, SUBSTRING_INDEX(qr_code,'-',1) AS p_code FROM ( SELECT qr_code, corr_edate, corr_title FROM tb_qr_corr WHERE yn = 'Y' AND push_chk = 'N' AND (corr_edate IS NOT NULL AND corr_edate != '') ) AS aaa ) AS bbb WHERE diff_cnt >= 0 AND diff_cnt < 15
